content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetRawLogAccessList path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/waf/v1alpha/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/raw_log_access content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum get raw log access list
desc blockcallout

  type danger
  body this is an alpha api call and should be considered very unstable please do not execute this in a production environment see our versioning guidelinesdocversioning for more information

/block

retrieve a list of ips or cidrs with access to waf raw logs
responses
200
wafgetrawlogaccesslistresponse
type obj
results
type arr
wafrawlogaccessip
type obj
props
ip
type str
desc the ip or cidr with access to waf raw logs
expiryat
type str
format datetime
desc the date an access to waf raw logs will expire
desc information about ip or cidr with access to waf raw logs
desc the requested information about ips or cidrs that have access to waf site raw logs
desc a response from a request to retrieve a list of ips or cidrs with access to waf raw logs
title: 19_Raw Log Access_GetRawLogAccessList_104.json
